attributes.action: NO CONFIDENCE IN THE PRESENT GOVERNMENT
attributes.additional_details: We call for a vote of no confidence in the present government due to their systematic destruction of much that was good in our society, their abysmal failure at providing any real jobs, their failure to control unemployment or the bankers, and their victimisation of the long-term unemployed and the disabled.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government
